not your business what

We want to see if these

So these are all things

>> Now, you choose

how you are bound, sir.
[Bryan sighs]
Zips or tape?

>> I'll--
>> Just kidding.
You get tape.
>> Well, I wanted zips, that's fine.

>> You know how much of

You don't like tape.

You don't know how tape works?

>> Okay, all right, all right.
[Jason hums]
There you go.
We'll keep it easy.

>> Okay.
>> There we go.

>> They're both knives
that are hidden as money.

You don't think that
